description: '''Louis XIV''' is an American [[rock band]] from [[San Diego]], [[California]]. The band has released four [[Extended play|EP]]s between 2003 and 2007, and three [[albums]] between 2003 and 2008, the latter two of which were distributed by [[Atlantic Records]]. The band broke up in 2009, but in 2013, in an interview with ''The Reno Dispatch'', [[Jason Hill (singer)|Jason Hill]] confirmed that the band had decided to reunite.
